body_html:
Sorry, was extremely busy with my PhD for a few weeks.
@hunkim's overlapping PR is a bit strange.
Looks like it doesn't correctly handle the floating point precision when going from complex to float and vice versa.
(For example, taking the real part of a complex128 returns a single precision float)
Handling this correctly is most of the work in this PR.

I can address @girving's suggestions over the next few days if there's still interest in merging this.

body:
Sorry, was extremely busy with my PhD for a few weeks.
@hunkim's overlapping PR is a bit strange.
Looks like it doesn't correctly handle the floating point precision when going from complex to float and vice versa.
(For example, taking the real part of a complex128 returns a single precision float)
Handling this correctly is most of the work in this PR.

I can address @girving's suggestions over the next few days if there's still interest in merging this.
